> [dragonloli](#comment_2_1LKvJWu95ZQcLSBxRgf7cVuBnHyfrdgv7m): Decentralized social media can't be cucked the way gab was

Decentralized social media like Zeronet have to be careful, though. Depending on how a zite is programmed it can be way too easy for an attacker to spam CP to it, and then the glow-in-the-darks have their excuse to track down and arrest everyone who's seeding it. Any decentralized social media site would have to be designed under the assumption that someone somewhere will want it destroyed and try to prevent this ahead of time.

What version of Zeronet are you guys running? I had nothing but problems when I updated to 0.7 (first version to use python 3) from the Zeronet site for a few hours. I downgraded back to 0.6.5 (uses python 2) and everything's been working smoothly since. I even had a clean transition to a ZeroID. Downgrading might be worth trying if you've exhausted all other options.

1565457997_17mM4YqSx7nMkYcePZB2GWcJBzkog.body:
Millchan Merger:  http://127.0.0.1:43110/17gCoQDCAAoQkzKRiajFNUAhnVD2gSNmuC/
Example board:  http://127.0.0.1:43110/13kifcv8J8noDEXdztXY4qkPPPKLK2PiAe/
/a/ - http://127.0.0.1:43110/1D23TdnwuQUwNcz5at3m6kyc6Wp1BC4dei/
/b/ - http://127.0.0.1:43110/17wWFMe7AyJx4qvFLfoepvQnGHTfcPG8N9/
Zeronet board:  http://127.0.0.1:43110/1N5WZ2QNXBKfhyhpktRZr2DE91QBJf7QDB/

Visit the main Millchan Merger site in the first link. It will be empty at first because you haven't visited any other board hubs. Then visit each of the other links. You'll see a blank page with an error saying to visit the board in Millchan Merger. That board will now be populated in the main Millchan Merger site if you go back to it (the first link). This is how you populate your Merger site. Every board on Millchan Merger is actually an entirely separate site, and the Main Millchan Merger site just aggregates them for you. Using this engine you can, for example, seed all of /a/ without seeding anything in /b/ if you don't want to.

Visiting boards on the normal Millchan site will NOT add them to your Millchan Merger site, only boards that were created from the merger engine.

Here's how to crate your own board on the Millchan Merger site:

1. go to ZeroHello or reload (F5) your already opened ZeroHello
2. into the site list filtering field, type: 13kifcv
3. move the mouse cursor over the Millchan Hub menu item and on the right, click the three dots. Then click "Clone"
4. copy the newly opened address of your hub to the safe place (possibly good to find your site address in zeronet/data/users.json and backup also related entries like private key)
5. open site menu (swipe the button in the top right corner to the left) and scroll down and set SITE TITLE, SITE DESCRIPTION (possibly do not use diacritics, special characters)
6. in the same site menu scroll up and click OPEN SITE DIRECTORY kind of option. You may backup all your site files here and then modify index.html to customize your site text.
7. then open file data\users\content.json and you can add other file types support here and raise "max_size" value to give your users more disk space. Default 5000000 (5 million bytes) is 5MB
8. if you made any modifications to the data/users/content.json, go to your site menu again, scroll down, click data/users/content.json link and "Sign and publish" button. ("Content publish failed." should not be a problem as the hub may have no peers yet)
Do the same signing and publish for the content.json if you modified index.html.
